article.title: Harris Corporation Awarded Contract to Supply Royal Netherlands Air Force with Remote Surveillance System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Harris Corporation was awarded a contract to supply the Royal Netherlands Air Force (RNLAF) with Falcon Watch Remote Surveillance Systems to provide force protection and perimeter security for forward operating bases in Afghanistan. The acquisition is part of the RNLAF's Transportable Intrusion Detection Systems program.
